Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-45142 affecting package heimdal for versions less than 7.8.0-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-45142 affecting package heimdal for versions less than 7.8.0-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package heimdal is earlier than 7.8.0-3, affected by CVE-2022-45142
